title: Symantec VIP - Events
description: This dashboard provides information about event logs generated on Symantec VIP Platform.

definition.content:
Symantec VIP (Validation and ID Protection Service) is a user-friendly, leading cloud-based strong authentication service that enables enterprises to secure access to networks and applications without impacting productivity.

This dashboard provides information about Event Logs generated on Symantec VIP.

For more information, see the [Symantec VIP Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/symantec_vip).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the upper-right corner of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify, and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Failed Local Authentication Attempts by User over Time
Top Not Allowed Operations for Current User
Top Users with Blocked Non US SMS/Voice Policy
Top Users with Invalid Friendly Name

search.query: source:symantec-vip service:event-logs @result.detail:(7120 OR 7121 OR 7122 OR 7123 OR 7124 OR 7125) $Client_IP $Operation $User_Name $Status_Code $Detail_Code

definition.title: Distribution by Valid VIP PIN Status
Distribution by Invalid VIP PIN Status
Top Users with Many SMS/Voice Credentials
Credential Validation by VIP User Services
Top Operations by Bad Credential State
Top Users with Mobile Push Request Error

search.query: source:symantec-vip service:event-logs @result.status:(602E OR 6041 OR 6042 OR 6043 OR 7002 OR 7004 OR 7005 OR 7006) $Client_IP $Operation $User_Name $Status_Code $Detail_Code

definition.content: Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Event logs to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security?query=source%3Asymantec-vip%20service%3Aevent).
